message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $9000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $11000. It's a fair price, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $10000.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm now offering the product to you for $11250. It's a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $10500.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm now offering the product to you for $11750. It's a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair agreement, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $11000.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $11250. This is my final offer.
I understand your final offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $11000.
